content.question: Which of the following best explains how devices and information can be susceptible to unauthorized access if weak passwords are used?

choices.label: Unauthorized individuals can deny service to a computing system by overwhelming the system with login attempts.
Unauthorized individuals can exploit vulnerabilities in compression algorithms to determine a user’s password from their decompressed data.
Unauthorized individuals can exploit vulnerabilities in encryption algorithms to determine a user’s password from their encryption key.
Unauthorized individuals can use data mining and other techniques to guess a user’s password.

content.answer: Unauthorized individuals can use data mining and other techniques to guess a user’s password.

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Evaluate the use of computing based on legal and ethical factors.
